response.overview: In this DVD, Mike Riddle explains biblical and scientific reasons why we should not compromise God's word with the idea of evolution. This lecture reveals things like; the days of creation and why the context, grammar and genealogies support literal days. We'll also see Biblical and scientific evidences for a worlwide flood, a comparison of creation and evolution with scientific laws and finally why it matters what we believe and what it costs to compromise Bonus Material includes interviews with Ken Ham - President of AIG, John Morris - Ph.D. & President of ICR, Douglas Kelly - Ph.D., Andy McIntosh - Ph.D., Terry Mortenson - Ph.D., Steven Boyd - Ph.D. Scenic video of God's creation
response.tagline: Does it matter what we believe?
response.title: Creation vs Evolution
